attributes.action: Introduce a White History Month to celebrate achievements & learn from mistakes.
attributes.additional_details: We live in an era of virtue signalling & guilt trips. White people are told that white privilege is real & profound. However, with big demographic changes taking place due to open borders & birth-rates, many white folks feel like a minority in towns & cities. Resentment & fear is up. No-one knows what 'British Values' are. The subtext espoused by educators & the media of the Empire legacy is negative & obsessed with slavery. Most inventions & institutions the world over stem from this Island.
attributes.background: We've had a Black History Month for years now but with many white people unaware of their own history with cultural & historical confusions due to political correctness, it's time for White History Month to help bring racial & religious harmony given that multi-culturalism has failed to assimilate.

rejection.details:
Black History Month isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more here:

http://www.blackhistorymonth.org.uk/

You could start a new petition calling for the National Curriculum for history to be changed, if that's what you would like to happen.
